com.poesys.bs.dto
Class ListBuilder<T,B>

java.lang.Object
  com.poesys.bs.dto.ListBuilder<T,B>
Type Parameters:
T - the input data-access transfer object type
B - the output business data transfer object type
public abstract class ListBuilder<T,B>
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract utility command class that generically builds a list of objects of type B from a list of objects of type T, given a conversion operation implemented in the concrete implementation of the abstract class. The output list is a threadsafe list such as a CopyOnWriteArrayList.

Author:
Robert J. Muller

getList

public java.util.List<B> getList(java.util.List<T> list)
Get a list containing objects of type B based on the objects in a list of objects of type T.

Parameters:
list - the list of input objects
Returns:
the list of output objects

get

public abstract B get(T dto)
Get an object of type B based on an object of type T. The concrete subclass implements this with an appropriate constructor of type B, usually in a nested class: 
 private ConvertTest extends ListBuilder<ITest, ITest> {
   public ITest get(ITest dto) {
     return new BsTest(dto);
   }
 }

Parameters:
dto - the DTO of type T
Returns:
a DTO of type B
